author: stefan2
msg: On the 10Gb branch: attempt zero-copy reporting for files contents
Since we push data directly from the membuffer to the network stack,
the respective membuffer segment will remain read-only to all other
requests until the OS accepted all data for that file.
svn_repos_node_t): update docstring references to rev'ed API
(svn_repos_begin_report2): implement in terms of the rev'ed API
(delta_files): if we send deltas against empty, use zero-copy code

msg: ACCUMULO-765 updated diffAPI.pl to show which methods are deprecated
